body:
Hello!, So since my last RP did REALLY well, I made another one. Now for a question in which you can answer: Should i make a 16x pack? Cause not all people have good PC's, But if 16x will help i can probably work something out. Getting ryte into the explanation: This is a 64x64 pack, didnt base it on anything, however its purpose to server as a - Pot PVP, Soup PVP, Standard PVP, Original PVP (Like OITC oh hive). So ill start off the credits first:

Inventory: Huahwi's 64x Defscape Edit
HotBar: xKingy's 32x Faithful edit 
Particles: xKingy's 32x Faithful edit
Food: Huahwi's 64x Defscape Edit
Text: Tiggy's Default edit 2.0
Widgets: Sphax PureBDCraft (xKingy's Faithful 32x Edit)
Armor: Huahwi's 64x Defscape Edit
Swords: Me

Thats pretty much it Here are the links:

Images

Download

Hope you guys enjoy the pack!! If this gets almost the same response as my Last one did Ill make sure to do another one :D..

LEAVE SUGGESTIONS ON WHAT PACK TO MAKE NEXT:

16x, 32x, 64x, 128x,   256 Takes to long ill do it after the next one.

title: [RP] Max's Faithful 64x Edit #2

replies.body:
Cool, this pack is better than your last one and I can still run it smoothly! :D

The one thing I don't like is the sun, but that's just preference and I'm sure other people like it.
Great job! +1

Oh, and a 16x edit would be pretty cool for others.

replies.body: Please send it the file to through Skype :O) (My windows is corrupt so I cant download.)
replies.body_tagged: Please send it the file to through Skype :O) (My windows is corrupt so I cant download.)

replies.body:
Thanks for the feedback! Ill change the sun and some other things.. Thank you <3
Btw Jitter clicking, Is actually pretty hard to learn, i recommend learning vibrating your finger not your wrist, it will be easier, i click like 10-13 CPS cause of it, OP :)\

And ye ill do a 16x edit next :)

Cole.. Umm skype?
